_description: ‘God spede the plowe alle way’ — nine 3-line stanzas (aab) with 3-line burden: ‘The Merthe of alle þis londe / maketh þe gode husbonde / wiþ eringe of his plowe’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
I blessyd be cristes sondeþat haþ vs sent in
                    honde…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
& longe gode lyfe to ledeAll þat for plowe men
                    pray
